model.name: Dreamy Slippers
model.disambiguatingDescription: In soft velvet embroidered with Louis Vuitton's iconic Monogram pattern, the Dreamy flat loafer is a supple home shoe designed to be slipped on with ease. Lightweight and exceptionally comfortable, this model in black color comes in a velvet pouch

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Monogram-embroidered velvet
  • Cashmere lining
  • Black
  • Extra-supple slippers
  • Delivered with a velvet pouch
  • Made in Italy
